attacks.name: Luring Flame
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Fiery Licks
attacks.effect: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Fire Energy cards you discarded.
